content: hey y'all, where is the best place to file or track issues regarding rendering issues of RFCs on https://rust-lang.github.io/rfcs/ ? I'm specifically looking at how https://rust-lang.github.io/rfcs/2856-project-groups.html#life-cycle-of-a-project-group does not render the figure that is visible at: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/blob/master/text/2856-project-groups.md#life-cycle-of-a-project-group

(One approach would be to figure out how to make that svg rendering work. Another approach woud be to port the diagram to some other domain-specific language, like Mermaid, where the semantic-content would likely be more directly expressed (while likely yielding control over precise presentation details)
In this particular case, it looks like the svg is in the wrong directory.
I can post a PR to fix it if you will agree to review it. :wink:
